title: Collaborative Learning-Based Science Domain Expertise Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Course designed for professionals to acquire foundational science competencies through collaborative learning in smartphone-based environments, emphasizing peer feedback and knowledge sharing

learning_goals: Learners can explain three fundamental concepts in science through collaborative learning activities
Learners can identify two types of errors occurring during scientific problem-solving through peer interaction and propose corrective measures
Learners can generate and share collaborative learning outcomes using smartphone-based tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
